医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究深入了解糖尿病相关椎间盘组织损伤的潜在机制2 型糖尿病改变了椎间盘的行为，使椎间盘变得更加僵硬，并且还导致椎间盘比正常情况更早改变形状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-provides-insight-into-pottial-mechanisms-underlying-diabetes-lated-disc-tissue-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-provides-insight-into-pottial-mechanisms-underlying-diabetes-lated-disc-tissue-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08ff43f5-77af-4980-8afc-4c614de5fe5b Tue, 13 Feb 2024 20:01:34 -0500 Study provides insight into potential mechanisms underlying diabetes-related disc tissue damage
基因决定口味：研究发现遗传与食物偏好有关研究揭示了遗传变异对成人饮食偏好的显着影响，强调了遗传与食物选择之间复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Genes-dictate-taste-Study-finds-genic-links-to-food-preferences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Genes-dictate-taste-Study-finds-genic-links-to-food-preferences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47dec8e6-32e5-41e1-af68-03181eb17d68 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:58:00 -0500 Genes dictate taste: Study finds genetic links to food preferences
研究表明 α-檀香醇对前列腺癌的发展具有化学预防作用檀香油是从檀香树（檀香树）的核心中提取的，几个世纪以来，世界各地的多种文化都将檀香油用于香水、肥皂、熏香和蜡烛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-demonstrates-chemo-preventive-properties-of-alpha-santalol-against-prostate-cancer-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-demonstrates-chemo-preventive-properties-of-alpha-santalol-against-prostate-cancer-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d22eb4fa-22ab-4c0f-ae95-6966e0f89c30 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:49:00 -0500 Study demonstrates chemo-preventive properties of alpha-santalol against prostate cancer development
科学家发现催产素如何影响动物的记忆催产素 (OXT) 是一种激素，因其对动物心理健康和情感联系的影响而闻名。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Scientists-discover-how-oxytocin-influences-memory-in-animals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Scientists-discover-how-oxytocin-influences-memory-in-animals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a23a26a-fea5-4821-a618-e632c933e15c Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:39:05 -0500 Scientists discover how oxytocin influences memory in animals
需要采取综合方法来解决口腔健康不平等和系统性健康负担“是时候把钱花在嘴边了：解决口腔健康方面的不平等问题”是由 EFP（欧洲牙周病学联合会）委托在 Haleon 的支持下今天发布的新《经济学人影响力》白皮书。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Combined-approach-needed-to-address-oral-health-inequalities-and-systemic-health-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Combined-approach-needed-to-address-oral-health-inequalities-and-systemic-health-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c2e6615-d138-46b9-a654-eb4dbb3b5867 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:35:52 -0500 Combined approach needed to address oral health inequalities and systemic health burden
糖尿病管理计划可降低 2 型患者患痴呆症的风险最近的一项研究强调了多学科糖尿病管理计划在降低 2 型糖尿病患者痴呆风险方面的有效性，强调了血糖控制对于预防痴呆的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Diabetes-management-program-cuts-dementia-risk-in-type-2-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Diabetes-management-program-cuts-dementia-risk-in-type-2-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=606efa71-9416-40f2-affe-3e900402c54a Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:00:00 -0500 Diabetes management program cuts dementia risk in type 2 patients
胶质纤维酸性蛋白水平提前十年确定未来痴呆风险研究人员将 GFAP 确定为一种有效的生物标志物，可在临床诊断前十多年预测痴呆症风险，强​​调其对无症状个体进行早期筛查和干预的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Glial-fibrillary-acidic- Protein-levels-pinpoint-future-dementia-risk-a-decade-in-advance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Glial-fibrillary-acidic- Protein-levels-pinpoint-future-dementia-risk-a-decade-in-advance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf40705e-c5c1-4f8f-ad33-f4c510214eaf Tue, 13 Feb 2024 18:41:00 -0500 Glial fibrillary acidic protein levels pinpoint future dementia risk a decade in advance
新研究揭示美国各地 EMS 系统的护理不一致西奈山伊坎医学院的一项新研究表明，紧急医疗服务 (EMS) 系统并未始终如一地为拨打 911 的患者提供基于新国家质量标准的最佳护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-study-reveals-inconcient-care-in-EMS-systems-across-the-United-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/New-study-reveals-inconcient-care-in-EMS-systems-across-the-United-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b576baa3-3fa1-42a3-8469-a6f19d966449 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 13:30:00 -0500 New study reveals inconsistent care in EMS systems across the United States
百年进步：美国心脏协会的历史历程与未来方向美国心脏协会是世界领先的致力于所有人心脏和大脑健康的志愿组织，自 1924 年成立以来的 100 年来，对心血管疾病的认识和治疗取得了巨大进步，挽救了数百万人的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/A- century-of-progress-American-Heart-Associations-historic-journey-and-future-directions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/A- century-of-progress-American-Heart-Associations-historic-journey-and-future-directions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2e14131-b85a-4ddc-a82b-4bad1d2a7a2d Tue, 13 Feb 2024 12:58:55 -0500 A century of progress: American Heart Association's historic journey and future directions
在英格兰，非白人婴儿的死亡风险更大布里斯托大学领导的一项新研究显示，如果英格兰所有婴儿的死亡风险与白人婴儿相同，那么英格兰百分之十二的婴儿死亡是可以避免的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Infants-of-non-White-ethnicities-are-at-greater-risk-of-death-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Infants-of-non-White-ethnicities-are-at-greater-risk-of-death-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc032a50-ebc9-4f1f-8158-271141126b23 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 12:40:35 -0500 Infants of non-White ethnicities are at greater risk of death in England
